channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: UEFA European Qualifiers Football
channel.desc: Stephen Watson presents full match coverage from Windsor Park as Northern Ireland take on Germany in the World Cup qualifiers. Three days on from hosting Slovakia, Michael O'Neill's men take on four-time World Cup winners Germany at a sold-out National Stadium. The Green and White Army will be in full voice and hoping for another big upset in south Belfast.
